name: nourish.party
description: Nourish Party is a community-focused, online payment platform for groups of interdependent creatives.

SLACK_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID for Slack OAuth. Get from https://api.slack.com/apps. Leave blank if you don't want to support Slack as a reward provider

SLACK_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client Secret for Slack OAuth. Get from https://api.slack.com/apps. Leave blank if you don't want to support Slack as a reward provider

STRIPE_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID for Stripe OAuth. Get from https://dashboard.stripe.com/account/applications/settings

STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY.description: Publishable key for generating stripe transactions. Get form https://dashboard.stripe.com/account/apikeys

STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key used to generate stripe transactions. Get form https://dashboard.stripe.com/account/apikeys
